name: Change Point Processor
description: Computes change points in a timeseries (observations as doubles)

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field containing the timeseries. Can either be a double if batch is set to true, or a sequence of doubles if batch is set to false.

parameters.name: batch
parameters.description: If set to true, the algorithm will run by making a list out of all values (indicated by field name) of each datum. Set to false will make the algorithm run on each datum separately, assuming that field contains a sequence of observations.

parameters.name: min_change
parameters.description: The minimum change that should occur to make a change count as a peak.

parameters.name: min_ratio
parameters.description: The minimum ratio from last observation to new to make a change count as a peak.

parameters.name: min_z_score
parameters.description: The minimum Z-score (normalized score) for a change to be called a peak.

parameters.name: inactive_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold determining when a series of observations is called inactive.

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: The amount of observations to take into account.
